Title: 1 - Nenokkadine
Writer: Hari Prasad Jakka (story), Arjun Y.K. (dialogue), Thota Srinivas (dialogue), Jeremy Zimmerman (screenplay)
Actors: Mahesh Babu, Kriti Sanon, Nassar, Pradeep Singh Rawat
Plot: A rock star must overcome his psychological inhibitions to seek revenge for his parents' death.
